doot.name: doot
doot.description: If the word "doot" appears ANYWHERE in the message, it is ESSENTIAL that this function is run regardless of the context.

when_to_meet.name: when_to_meet
when_to_meet.description: Provide a link to help people decide when to meet. This is meant to help schedule meetings and coordinate activities and events.

get_layer_info.name: get_layer_info
get_layer_info.description: Get information for a specific layer in the GATO framework. Access this function if the user has expressed interest in learning more about that layer or wants detailed information about the layer.

layer.description: The layer that the user is interested in

paper.name: paper
paper.description: Search arXiv for papers. This is meant to help people find papers to read. Access this function if the user has expressed interest in finding a paper.
